title: Haim (band)
summary: Haim (/ˈhaɪɪm/ HY-im;[1] meaning "life" in Hebrew,[lower-alpha 1] stylized in all caps) is an American pop rock band, based in Los Angeles and containing three sisters, Este (/ˈɛsti/ ESS-tee;[3] bass guitar and vocals), Danielle (lead vocals, guitar, and drums), and Alana Haim (/əˈlɑːnə/ ə-LAH-nə;[3] guitars, keyboards, and vocals). In addition to their primary instruments, each is proficient in several others. The group's pop sound on their studio work stands in contrast to the more rock-based music of their live shows.
